title: Prague lads weekend
excerpt: Nightlife, beer halls, and a plan that keeps everyone on budget.
bestFor: Groups who want nightlife, value, and simple logistics across the weekend.
summary: A high-energy weekend with iconic bars, smart logistics, and a schedule that keeps the group together.
highlights: Central stay near Old Town Square
Two-night nightlife plan with pre-booked tables
Morning recovery route with coffee + brunch spots

itinerary.title: Day 1: Arrival + old town warm-up
itinerary.detail: Meet at the hotel, quick walking loop to get bearings, then early dinner and a curated bar crawl.

itinerary.title: Day 2: Experiences + night out
itinerary.detail: Choose between beer spa or shooting range, then dinner bookings and a club plan with transport mapped.

itinerary.title: Day 3: Chill + departures
itinerary.detail: Slow brunch, souvenir stop, and a clear airport transfer plan.

faq.question: Is this plan budget friendly?
faq.answer: Yes — the itinerary is built around your per-person budget and capped options.

faq.question: Can we swap in different activities?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We tailor the schedule to your vibe and energy levels.

title: Peak District pub hike
excerpt: Fresh air, proper walks, and perfectly timed pub stops.
bestFor: Groups who want countryside, walking routes, and proper pub stops.
summary: A classic UK lads weekend combining scenic hikes, countryside pubs, and simple transport so everyone stays on schedule.
highlights: Circular walking route with 2–3 pub stops
Options for shorter and longer routes
Village accommodation close to the trail

itinerary.title: Day 1: Arrival + village night
itinerary.detail: Check in, unpack, then reserved pub table for dinner and a relaxed first night.

itinerary.title: Day 2: Main hike + pub loop
itinerary.detail: Guided route over Mam Tor and surrounding ridges, lunch stop booked, then walk back for dinner.

itinerary.title: Day 3: Coffee + depart
itinerary.detail: Easy morning, short scenic walk, then organised return transport.

faq.question: Is the route beginner friendly?
faq.answer: Yes — we offer multiple route lengths and clear regroup points.

faq.question: Do we need cars?
faq.answer: No. We can arrange group transport or train-friendly plans.

title: Lisbon long weekend
excerpt: Sun, rooftops, and nightlife with zero planning stress.
bestFor: Groups who want sun, rooftops, and a balanced nightlife plan.
summary: A sun-soaked long weekend mixing rooftop bars, waterfront spots, and nightlife with a relaxed daytime pace.
highlights: Central stay in Bairro Alto or Chiado
Optional beach trip with transfers arranged

itinerary.title: Day 1: Arrival + rooftops
itinerary.detail: Drop bags, walk through Bairro Alto, sunset drinks, and relaxed dinner bookings.

itinerary.title: Day 2: City + coast
itinerary.detail: Morning tram ride and pastries, afternoon beach visit or LX Factory, then big night out.

itinerary.title: Day 3: Culture + party
itinerary.detail: Alfama walk and viewpoints, seafood dinner, then late bars and clubs.

itinerary.title: Day 4: Wind down
itinerary.detail: Brunch, souvenir shopping, and organised airport transfers.

faq.question: Can we make it more nightlife focused?
faq.answer: Yes — we can increase nightlife options and adjust daytime pacing.

faq.question: Is Lisbon good for stag groups?
faq.answer: Yes. It’s affordable, sunny, and has strong nightlife without being rowdy.

title: Barcelona nightlife weekend
excerpt: Beach days, rooftop evenings, and late-night El Born sessions.
bestFor: Groups who want beach time, tapas, and late-night bar routes.
summary: A sun-and-city blend with beach time, tapas, and curated bar routes that keep the group together.
highlights: Central stay near Barceloneta or El Born
Mapped late bars with transport plan

itinerary.title: Day 1: Arrival + tapas
itinerary.detail: Check in, beach walk, sunset rooftop, and tapas crawl.

itinerary.title: Day 2: Beach + city
itinerary.detail: Morning beach, afternoon Gothic Quarter, evening El Born bars.

itinerary.title: Day 3: Montjuïc + party
itinerary.detail: Views over the city, dinner booking, and curated club route.

faq.question: Is Barcelona expensive?
faq.answer: It can be — we tailor to your per-person budget.

faq.question: Best areas to stay?
faq.answer: El Born, Barceloneta, or Eixample depending on vibe.

title: Edinburgh city break
excerpt: Old Town charm, pub culture, and scenic viewpoints.
bestFor: Groups who want classic city pubs, walks, and compact logistics.
summary: A compact city weekend with walks, pub stops, and simple logistics that keep everyone together.
highlights: Central stay near the Royal Mile
Arthur’s Seat hike and city viewpoints

itinerary.title: Day 1: Arrival + Royal Mile
itinerary.detail: Check in, Old Town walk, dinner, and cosy pub route.

itinerary.title: Day 2: Arthur’s Seat + city
itinerary.detail: Morning hike, lunch, museums, and evening pub crawl.

itinerary.title: Day 3: Brunch + depart
itinerary.detail: Brunch, shopping, and organised train/airport transfers.

faq.question: Is it walkable?
faq.answer: Yes — the city is compact with great walking routes.

faq.question: Good for mixed budgets?
faq.answer: Yes. We balance options to keep the group happy.
